short.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G: YourMoviesLink Default Search allows you to easily change and set your default search engine.

long.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G:
YourMoviesLink Default Search is a free cutting-edge Chrome browser extension that enables you to change your default search engine to the one that is different from your current search engine so you would enjoy the most precise and excellent search results powered by Bing.

By clicking “Add to Chrome”, you accept and agree to install the YourMoviesLink Default Search Chrome extension, set the Chrome Default Search to YourMoviesLink Default Search powered by Bing, and adhere to the Terms and Privacy Policy.

How it works:
1. In the YourMoviesLink Default Search extension settings select from a few top search engines.
2. Once you have selected your default search engine, your Omni bar (address bar) searches will be performed through the default search engine that you have chosen.
3. Enjoy a simple and easy way to update and search different search engines to get the best search results.

Visit our website at https://yourmovieslinks.com/
Read more about us: https://yourmovieslinks.com/about/
Read our Privacy Policy: https://yourmovieslinks.com/privacy-policy/
Read our Terms & Conditions: https://yourmovieslinks.com/terms-and-conditions/
Uninstall Instructions: https://yourmovieslinks.com/uninstall-from-chrome/

If at any point after installing YourMoviesLink Default Search, you feel it is not right for you, don’t worry about it! There are two simple ways to uninstall the extension.

Removal Instructions One:
Step 1: Right click on the extension in the top right corner of your browser.
Step 2: Click ‘Remove’

Or

Removal Instructions Two:
Step 1: Click on the three dots/horizontal lines icon in the top right corner of your Chrome browser.
Step 2: Go to "Settings".
Step 3: On the left-hand side, click on ‘Extensions’
Step 4: Find the extension that you wish to remove and click the ‘Remove’ button.
Step 5: The extension should be removed from your Chrome browser.
